description:
Goblin pirate ships with unicorn figureheads. Epic seaborn showdowns between Ninjas and mercenaries. Sea monsters, big and small. All of this and more are jam packed into the Sea King Adventure Card Game by Party Pug Games. Is it possible for this riot of styles and themes to all work together harmoniously, creating an interesting […]

Source
title: Sea King Adventures Review

description:
Crowdfunding Quest is back this week with another large batch of campaigns for you to check out. We’ve got a nice grouping from war games to euro games to party games. So hopefully you find something here that piques your interest. And if you missed it on Friday, we announced the nominees for our 2023 […]
